product_highlights: Global thought leader in circular economy principles
Comprehensive frameworks for circular business models
Strong emphasis on plastics and packaging circularity
notes: The Ellen MacArthur Foundation is a global thought leader in circular economy principles and consulting. They work with cosmetics brands to develop circular business models, redesign products for circularity, and optimize material flows. Their New Plastics Economy initiative specifically addresses packaging sustainability challenges in the beauty industry, bringing together brands, suppliers, and policymakers to accelerate the transition to a circular economy for plastics.
